Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Diablo in 1969...
Injured on 7/6/1969 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 5/29/1970 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 6/10/1970 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/26/1971 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/20/1972 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/29/1972 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 6/16/1973 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 8/10/1973 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 8/4/1974 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 6/22/1975...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/27/1975, off Patrick Peltier (TOL)...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/3/1981 to a 3-year deal worth $5,367,500 per year...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1985, going 5-0, 0.90...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1986, going 3-0, 1.31...
Traded from Pontiac to Gashouse on 3/1/1987 (Going to PON: SS D. Tremane. Going to GHG: P T. Worthy, P H. Outland)...
